    Class Description
    IsCharUniqeChecker
    Check is all char in the string repeat one time.
    Exercise 5
    IsSubstringChecker
    Check if one string is cycle shift of another
    Exercise 9
    LetterReplacer
    replace char number k in each word of text
    Exercise 1
    LetterToAlphabetIndex
    Prints english letter alphabet indexes for a some text.
    Exercise 2
    MatrixZeroFinder
    Find 0 in matrix and replace all elements in row and column by 0 and prints both matrix
    Exercise 8
    NonLetterCharRemover
    Delete from text all non-letter symbols except spaces
    Exercise 3
    StingDemixer
    String check if some sting has same set and amount of characters to another
    Exercise 6
    StringCompresser
    simple string compression class
    Exercise 7
    WordDeleter
    Delete words of given length from text, if it starts from consonant letter
    Exercise 4
